org.apache.juneau.html

Class HtmlBeanPropertyMeta

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.BeanPropertyMetaExtended
      • org.apache.juneau.html.HtmlBeanPropertyMeta

  • public final class HtmlBeanPropertyMeta
extends BeanPropertyMetaExtended
    Metadata on bean properties specific to the HTML serializers and parsers pulled from the @Html annotation on the bean property.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static HtmlBeanPropertyMeta DEFAULT
      Default instance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HtmlBeanPropertyMeta(BeanPropertyMeta bpm)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAnchorText()
      Specifies the anchor text for this property.
      protected HtmlFormat getFormat()
      Returns the format of this bean property
      String getLink()
      Adds a hyperlink to this value in HTML.
      HtmlRender getRender()
      Returns the render class for rendering the style and contents of this property value in HTML.
      protected boolean isHtml()
      Returns true if getFormat() returns HtmlFormat.HTML.
      protected boolean isHtmlCdc()
      Returns true if getFormat() returns HtmlFormat.HTML_CDC.
      protected boolean isHtmlSdc()
      Returns true if getFormat() returns HtmlFormat.HTML_SDC.
      boolean isNoTableHeaders()
      Returns whether this bean property should not include table headers when serialized as an HTML table.
      protected boolean isNoTables()
      Returns whether this bean property should not be serialized as an HTML table.
      protected boolean isPlainText()
      Returns true if getFormat() returns HtmlFormat.PLAIN_TEXT.
      protected boolean isXml()
      Returns true if getFormat() returns HtmlFormat.XML.

                     throws Exception

    • Method Detail

      • getFormat

        protected HtmlFormat getFormat()
        Returns the format of this bean property
        Returns:
        The value of the Html.format() annotation.

      • isXml

        protected boolean isXml()
        Returns true if getFormat() returns HtmlFormat.XML.
        Returns:
        true if getFormat() returns HtmlFormat.XML.

      • isPlainText

        protected boolean isPlainText()
        Returns true if getFormat() returns HtmlFormat.PLAIN_TEXT.
        Returns:
        true if getFormat() returns HtmlFormat.PLAIN_TEXT.

      • isHtml

        protected boolean isHtml()
        Returns true if getFormat() returns HtmlFormat.HTML.
        Returns:
        true if getFormat() returns HtmlFormat.HTML.

        protected boolean isHtmlCdc()
        Returns true if getFormat() returns HtmlFormat.HTML_CDC.
        Returns:
        true if getFormat() returns HtmlFormat.HTML_CDC.

        protected boolean isHtmlSdc()
        Returns true if getFormat() returns HtmlFormat.HTML_SDC.
        Returns:
        true if getFormat() returns HtmlFormat.HTML_SDC.

      • isNoTables

        protected boolean isNoTables()
        Returns whether this bean property should not be serialized as an HTML table.
        Returns:
        true if the the @Html annotation is specified, and @Html(noTables) is true.

      • isNoTableHeaders

        public boolean isNoTableHeaders()
        Returns whether this bean property should not include table headers when serialized as an HTML table.
        Returns:
        true if the the @Html annotation is specified, and @Html(noTableHeaders) is true.

      • getRender

        public HtmlRender getRender()
        Returns the render class for rendering the style and contents of this property value in HTML.

        This value is specified via the @Html(render) annotation.

        Returns:
        The render class, never null.

      • getLink

        public String getLink()
        Adds a hyperlink to this value in HTML.

        This value is specified via the @Html(link) annotation.

        Returns:
        The link string, or null if not specified.

      • getAnchorText

        public String getAnchorText()
        Specifies the anchor text for this property.

        This value is specified via the @Html(anchorText) annotation.

        Returns:
        The link string, or null if not specified.
